textBox.richText: Two joint papers on anti-spoofing have been accepted to ICB 2013: “Complementary Countermeasures for Detecting Scenic Face Spoofing Attacks”, Jukka Komulainen, André Anjos, Abdenour Hadid, Sébastien Marcel and Matti  Pietikainen Link on paper + source code: http://publications.idiap.ch/index.php/publications/show/2555 “Can face anti-spoofing countermeasures work in a real world scenario?”, Tiago De Freitas Pereira, André Anjos, José Mario De Martino, Sébastien Marcel (Oral Presentation) Link on paper + source code: http://publications.idiap.ch/index.php/publications/show/2554 See you in Spain, Hasta la vista !
Source code of papers at ICB 2013 available
